channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Steve Brown is with a buyer who has a ?425,000 budget to spend on a new house in her childhood home county of Devon. It's an emotional return to her roots, so with her daughter by her side for support, the trio tour a range of tempting options, including a standout mystery house. On his travels, Steve also visits an organic, family-run orchard, which produces award-winning cider.
